features: REPAIRS EXTREMELY DRY SKIN: Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Unscented Body Lotion locks in moisture and repairs extremely dry skin
FORMULATED WITH ULTRA-HYDRATING LIPIDS: This unscented body lotion for dry skin is formulated with Vaseline Jelly and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture
FEEL THE DIFFERENCE: This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin)
NON-GREASY FEEL: This fast-acting unscented lotion absorbs quickly to leave your skin hydrated without feeling greasy
DAILY SKIN CARE: Use Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Body Lotion as your daily lotion for dry, rough skin. Just apply to your skin for long-lasting hydration and noticeably healthier skin
EQUITABLE SKIN CARE FOR ALL: Skin health is essential for well-being. We’re helping the underserved get better care for their skin
body.description: Made with Vaseline Jelly and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids, Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Unscented Body Lotion for dry skin prevents dryness and helps keep your skin looking healthy and hydrated. With daily exposure to environmental triggers (like wind, lack of humidity, and sun), skin's natural moisture barrier can break down, allowing water to escape the skin. But the Ultra-Hydrating Lipids in our Advanced Repair Lotion fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture to allow the skin's natural barrier to recover. Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Unscented Lotion, formulated with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Vaseline Jelly, locks in moisture and repairs extremely dry skin. This unscented body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin). This lotion for dry skin absorbs fast for rich moisturization without feeling greasy and provides 48-hour moisture. Use this dermatologist-tested body lotion daily on dry, rough skin for stronger, noticeably healthier skin. Just apply to your skin for long-lasting moisture. This lotion bottle is made of 50% recycled plastic. Our ambition is to get to 100% recycled plastic in the near future. Since 2018, we've used 337 Metric Tons of recycled plastic across the Vaseline product portfolio in North America.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Vaseline Intensive Care Advanced Repair Lotion, with Ultra Hydrating Lipids and Vaseline Jelly, moisturizes and repairs extremely dry skin. This body moisturizer is clinically tested to provide 90% more moisture (vs. untreated skin).

Advanced Repair Unscented This body lotion revitalizes and repairs extremely dry, rough skin. Hydrating Ingredients Our formula includes Vaseline Jelly and Ultra Hydrating Lipids that fortify the skin barrier and replenish moisture. Feel the Difference This non-greasy body lotion provides 48-hour moisture. A Lotion for Every Skin Vaseline has a range of products to help heal, soothe and moisturize all skin.

Vaseline Intensive Care Sensitive Skin Relief Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Vaseline Intensive Care Soothing Hydration Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Vaseline Intensive Care Essential Healing Hand and Body Lotion, 20.3 oz Main Benefit Vaseline Intensive Care Sensitive Skin Relief Body Lotion, formulated with a combination of Colloidal Oatmeal and Ultra-Hydrating Lipids, provides long lasting and soothing moisture. Vaseline Intensive Care Soothing Hydration body lotion with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and 1% Aloe Vera Extract moisturizes and soothes dry dehydrated skin. Vaseline Intensive Care Essential Healing Hand and Body Lotion with Ultra-Hydrating Lipids and Pure Oat Extract, moisturizes and nourishes for healthy-looking skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for massage!
reviews.reviewText: My husband is an ALS patient and gets sore muscles. This lotion has good, lasting slip to it and this makes massage much easier. No scent or fragrance is a plus! It's not sticky and it does hydrate the skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Skin Moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: Lotion absorbs quickly and lasts for a long time. Unscented and works well on dry and sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have tried multiple lotions and oils. My legs were so dry. I looked for a lotion that Vaseline made years ago that worked, but I couldn’t find it. They came out with this lotion and it is great. My skin is so soft and hydrated. I love this lotion. It is perfect. It doesn’t make my skin feel greasy, just soft. I bought four more bottles just so I wouldn’t run out. I highly recommend this lotion, and I hope Vaseline never stops making this lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dry skin
reviews.reviewText: Like many other people I have really dry skin especially in the winter months. As soon as I turn the heat on in my house it becomes as dry as the Sahara Desert.I started using this lotion about a year or so ago, I believe it had different labeling but it's the same product. After using it my skin feels amazing and my wife even compliments me on how nice my skin looks and feels.I bought the 4 pack since I use it alot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Lotion, but the Pump's Nozzle Needs Work
reviews.reviewText: My elderly parent's poor vision make it difficult for them to identify the side of the pump the lotion will come out of. This issue is, of course, exacerbated in lower lighting conditions. The wide surface of the top of the pump is very comfortable to the hand, but both sides are identical and it can be a challenge to know where the lotion will come out. Oh well, they usually guess correctly 50% of the time! Ha ha ha. I marked the opening side with a white paint pen to help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: EXCELLENT MOISTERIZER...NO FRAGRANCE WORKS GREAT FOR 80+ YEAR SKIN...WILL BUY AGAIN. PS...ALSO VERY GOOD VALUE.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and Price
reviews.reviewText: This is a great price for this size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is unscented, so it doesn't clash with anything.
reviews.reviewText: This lotion goes on non-greasy and soaks right in.

reviews.reviewTitle: Best lotion for dry skin & amazing price!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using Vaseline Intensive Care, Advanced Repair for a few years now. I use it on my extremely dry hands. Since menopause, my skin is super dry all year not just in winter. I put it on at night & by morning my hands aren't dry. I re-apply in the morning. It's non-greasy & has no scent which I like. I bought this from Amazon because you can't beat the price! I bought ONE bottle of the same lotion at the drug store for $17.00 plus taxes. Amazon is selling them for 3 bottles for $20.00! I was skeptical so I ordered it just to see & YES, 3 bottles showed up & only billed me $20.00 for them. This might be a time limited deal but I'm not sure. Best cream ever!

We love this vaseline product. It really helps moisturize ourselves and our toddler. Our toddler has sensitive skin and we were worried about trying something new... so glad we took a chance. No looking back now.Why did I not give 5 stars? I never know what side the pump is on when I'm grabbing lotion... haha. It only comes out one side, but looks like both? I have been caught off guard a couple times.If you are looking for excellent moisturizing lotion, look no further. Just minus one star for lost product to the floor.
Moisturizing, good skin repair.I like it and have used it for a long time.
